comment: /**  * Recursively unwraps this WrappingRuntimeException and its causes, getting the first  * non wrapping exception.  *  * @return The first cause that is not a wrapping exception.  */
code: /**  * Recursively unwraps this WrappingRuntimeException and its causes, getting the first  * non wrapping exception.  *  * @return The first cause that is not a wrapping exception.  */ public Throwable unwrap() {     Throwable cause = getCause().     return (cause instanceof WrappingRuntimeException) ? ((WrappingRuntimeException) cause).unwrap() : cause. }
